articles.title: Find a critical bug in Sony PS4 and earn Rs 38 lakh - Times Now
articles.description: The bug bounty programme has rewards for various issues, including critical issues on PS4. Critical vulnerabilities for PS4 have bounties starting at $50,000 while for PlayStation Network is $3,000.
